==Puzzles==
===Underground Ruins===
* See [[A Particularly Particular Author#Shirikoro Peak|A Particularly Particular Author § Shirikoro Peak]] for instructions on how to unlock the underground ruins.
** The underground ruins can be unlocked and some of its puzzles completed before talking to Ruu in ''A Particularly Particular Author''. However, certain puzzles and the Hidden Exploration Objective require completing certain steps in ''A Particularly Particular Author'' or its follow-up quest, ''[[Octave of the Maushiro]]''.
* The 3 [[Star-Shaped Gem]]s can be used on the murals to release [[Electro Seelie]].
* The 7 [[Stone Slate]]s can be used in the underground cavern between Shirikoro Peak and [[Chirai Shrine]].

==NPCs==
*[["Boatman"]]

==Trivia==
*The underground ruins are permanently changed after interacting with the first [[Perch]] (Step 6) in ''A Particularly Particular Author'': the lighting is darkened, cobwebs can be seen around the area, and an echoing sound effect is added. None of these are present beforehand.

===Etymology===
* The name may derive from Ainu {{Lang|mini=1|ain=シㇼコㇿ|ain_rm=sirkor}}, which literally means "owning land."
** Shirikoro Peak may also be named after {{Lang|sir-kor-kamuy|ain=シㇼコㇿカムィ|ain_tl=the god who governs the earth}}, the Ainu {{W|kamuy}} of the earth.
